mapper.sql: organization.ID, organization.NAME, organization.PID, organization.ORDER_NUM, organization.ICON, organization.STATUS, organization.SAVE_DATE, organization.SAVE_PERSON, organization.UPDATE_DATE, organization.UPDATE_PERSON
mapper.select: SELECT , organization1.NAME pName FROM free_organization organization LEFT JOIN free_organization organization1 ON organization.PID = organization1.ID WHERE organization.ID = #{id} LIMIT 1
SELECT ID, NAME, PID pId, ORDER_NUM FROM free_organization WHERE STATUS = '1'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free_organization ( NAME, PID, ORDER_NUM, ICON, STATUS, SAVE_DATE, SAVE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_PERSON ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{pid}, #{orderNum}, #{icon}, #{status}, #{saveDate}, #{savePerson}, #{updateDate}, #{updatePerson} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE free_organization SET
ID = #{id},
NAME = #{name},
PID = #{pid},
ORDER_NUM = #{orderNum},
ICON = #{icon},
STATUS = #{status},
SAVE_DATE = #{saveDate},
SAVE_PERSON=#{savePerson},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate},
UPDATE_PERSON = #{updatePerson},
WHERE ID=#{id}
